thread.title: OT: Colts set NFL record with 16th straight division win tonight
thread.title_full: OT: Colts set NFL record with 16th straight division win tonight

author: GatorHater
title: OT: Colts set NFL record with 16th straight division win tonight
text: Join Date: May 2002 Posts: 22,239 I find all four of these teams incredibly boring to watch. Easily the crappiest division in the NFL. We live in a world which is full of misery and ignorance, and the plain duty of each and all of us is to try to make the little corner he can influence somewhat less miserable and somewhat less ignorant than it was before he entered it. T.H. Huxley
